TextView.android:text: INTERVIEWER: Now, please allow me to ask you about the materials of your homestead/dwelling/residence and assets that you own
What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household ?\n(Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 97)
What is the main source that your household uses for other needs; hand washing,cooking, bathing, laundry.
What kind of main toilet facility do members of your household usually use ? (IF FLUSH, OR POUR FLUSH, PROBE: WHERE DOES IT FLUSH TO?)
Do you share this toilet facility with other households?
Including your own household, how many households use this toilet facility? No. Of Households (If Less Than 10)
Where is this toilet facility located ?
Do you have a place for hand washing in this household ?
Can you please show me where members of your household most often wash their hands? Record result and observation.

RadioButton.android:text: NOT OBSERVED: No handwashing place in dwelling/yard/plot
NOT OBSERVED: No permission to see

TextView.android:text: Do you have available water for hand washing? Verify by checking the tap/pump, or basin, bucket, water container or similar objects for presence of water)
Is soap or detergent or ash/mud/sand present at the place for handwashing?
Where do you or other members of your household most often wash your hands?
Do you have any soap or detergent or ash/mud/sand in your house for washing hands?
HW6. Can you please show it to me?
Record your observation. Record all that apply.
What device does this household use most of the time for cooking food, making tea/coffee, or boiling drinking water ? \n(Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 97)

When cooking, what type of fuel or energy source does this household use most of the time for cooking food, making tea/coffee, or boiling drinking water?\n(Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 97)
Where is the cooking done most of the time?\n (Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 97)

What is the main material of the floor of your homestead/dwelling/residence?\n(Circle One Response, Or Write Response For 7) \n(Main Material Is The Material That Covers The Largest Amount Of Floor Space)

What is the main material of the roof of your homestead/dwelling/residence?\n (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 97)\n (MAIN MATERIAL IS THE MATERIAL THAT COVERS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF ROOF SPACE)

What is the main material of the exterior walls of the house that is your main homestead/dwelling/residence?\n (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 97)/n (MAIN MATERIAL IS THE MATERIAL THAT COVERS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF EXTERIOR WALL SPACE)
How many rooms in your homestead/dwelling/residence are used for sleeping ?\n(Write The Number On The Blank) (A Room Divided By A Curtain Counts As One Room)
Does your household own any homestead?
Does your household own any agricultural land?
The Interviewer Should Ask About Household Ownership For Each Item Listed Below. Tick Item(S) That Apply (Yes).
